de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.statemachine

Class AbstractStateHelper<T extends TnccsContentHandler>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.statemachine.AbstractStateHelper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the helper type based on its content handler (e.g. TNCC -> TNCC content handler)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    StateHelper<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultClientStateHelper, DefaultServerStateHelper

    public abstract class AbstractStateHelper<T extends TnccsContentHandler>
extends Object
implements StateHelper<T>
    Generic helper base to make information and commonly used functions accessible to a TNC(C/S) state. Especially important for inheritance.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed attributes 
      private T contentHandler 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AbstractStateHelper(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed attributes, T contentHandler)
      Creates a generic base for a state helper with the given session and/or connection attributes, which should be accessible by a state and a content handler, that provides message handling functions.

    • Method Summary

      Returns accessible session and/or connection attributes.
      T getHandler()

        Creates a generic base for a state helper with the given session and/or connection attributes, which should be accessible by a state and a content handler, that provides message handling functions.
